page.title: 10THE MELROSE MOTOR MUSEUM
page.content: {The Melrose Motor Museum}opened in 1982.It is situated near Melrose Abbey.It has over 30 different cars and 40 motorbikes and bicycles.It also has sirens from air raids in World War 2.The oldest car is a{1909 Albion which is also the largest.The most popular model is a{Harley Davidson Bike.The Americans like the{Bentleys best though.The smallest models are some matchbox cars.There is a {handpulled cart from Sri Lanka}which was last used in 1973.The cars came from the owner (Mr Dale),an overflow from the museum in{Myreton}and some are on loan.In the summer Mr Dale will take out the{Rolls Royce or Bentley and give tourists a guided tour of Melrose.The collection was originally formed because Mr Dale had an interest in cars.
